an4.191:1.1: “Sotanugatanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam, vacasa paricitanam, manasanupekkhitanam, ditthiya suppatividdhanam cattaro anisamsa patikankha.
an4.191:1.4: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:1.5: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:1.6: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an4.191:1.9: atha so satto khippamyeva visesagami hoti.
an4.191:1.10: Sotanugatanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam, vacasa paricitanam, manasanupekkhitanam, ditthiya suppatividdhanam ayam pathamo anisamso patikankho.
an4.191:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.191:2.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:2.3: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:2.4: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an4.191:2.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapada plavanti;
an4.191:2.6: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto devaparisayam dhammam deseti.
an4.191:2.8: ‘ayam va so dhammavinayo, yatthaham pubbe brahmacariyam acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.10: atha so satto khippameva visesagami hoti.
an4.191:2.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kankha va vimati va:
an4.191:2.14: ‘bherisaddo nu kho, na nu kho bherisaddo’ti.
an4.191:2.16: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.191:2.17: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:2.18: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:2.19: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an4.191:2.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapada plavanti;
an4.191:2.21: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto devaparisayam dhammam deseti.
an4.191:2.23: ‘ayam va so dhammavinayo, yatthaham pubbe brahmacariyam acarin’ti.
an4.191:2.25: atha so satto khippamyeva visesagami hoti.
an4.191:2.26: Sotanugatanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam, vacasa paricitanam, manasanupekkhitanam, ditthiya suppatividdhanam ayam dutiyo anisamso patikankho.

an4.191:3.17: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:3.18: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:3.19: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.

an4.191:3.21: api ca kho devaputto devaparisayam dhammam deseti.

an4.191:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.191:4.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:4.3: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:4.4: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an4.191:4.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapada plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto devaparisayam dhammam deseti, napi devaputto devaparisayam dhammam deseti;
an4.191:4.6: api ca kho opapatiko opapatikam sareti:
an4.191:4.7: ‘sarasi tvam, marisa, sarasi tvam, marisa, yattha mayam pubbe brahmacariyam acarimha’ti.
an4.191:4.11: atha so satto khippamyeva visesagami hoti.
an4.191:4.14: Anno pana sahayako sahayakam evam vadeyya:
an4.191:4.18: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammam pariyapunati—
an4.191:4.19: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.191:4.20: Tassa te dhamma sotanugata honti, vacasa paricita, manasanupekkhita, ditthiya suppatividdha.
an4.191:4.21: So mutthassati kalam kurumano annataram devanikayam upapajjati.
an4.191:4.22: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapada plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto devaparisayam dhammam deseti, napi devaputto devaparisayam dhammam deseti;
an4.191:4.23: api ca kho opapatiko opapatikam sareti:
an4.191:4.24: ‘sarasi tvam, marisa, sarasi tvam, marisa, yattha mayam pubbe brahmacariyam acarimha’ti.
an4.191:4.28: atha kho so satto khippamyeva visesagami hoti.
an4.191:4.29: Sotanugatanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam, vacasa paricitanam, manasanupekkhitanam, ditthiya suppatividdhanam ayam catuttho anisamso patikankho.
an4.191:4.30: Sotanugatanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam, vacasa paricitanam, manasanupekkhitanam ditthiya suppatividdhanam ime cattaro anisamsa patikankha”ti.
